mapper.select: SELECT issueSeq AS ISSUESEQ , title AS TITLE , workSeq AS WORKSEQ , workName AS WORKNAME , projectSeq AS PROJECTSEQ , projectName AS PROJECTNAME , TO_CHAR(regDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REGDATE , TO_CHAR(hopeDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS HOPEDATE , TO_CHAR(manageDate, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS MANAGEDATE , content AS CONTENT , imergency AS IMERGENCY , iType AS ITYPE , iStateSeq AS ISTATESEQ , IRoleSeq AS IROLESEQ FROM TBLISSUE WHERE 1 = 1
